summary: This document contains email correspondence regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team. Amanda Kirby is coordinating the meeting times with Lesley Groff and Paul, indicating Epstein's return to New York City and his account management.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is involved in scheduling the meeting with Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is part of the Deutsche Bank team who will be managing Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request to set up a meeting.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual for whom the meeting is being scheduled with the Deutsche Bank team.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team.
Lesley Groff is involved in the scheduling of a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

Harry provided information to Amanda Kirby regarding Epstein's request for a meeting.

events.title: Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A meeting is being scheduled with Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team during the week of October 8.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team.
The meeting is proposed for the week of October 8, 2013.
Lesley Groff is involved in the scheduling of the meeting.
Harry informed Amanda about Epstein's request for the meeting.
Paul is part of the Deutsche Bank team managing Epstein's accounts.
